entry.title: How To Colossally Fuck Shit Up
entry.summary:
Author: Cashewchococake

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,601Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 225

Summary: A story about Derek and Stiles building their family and trying to find their way to each other.orStiles was looking at him expectedly.Derek took a deep breath and prepared himself for the upcoming words. “But I wasn’t the only one he smelled like, Stiles.”He looked pleadingly at Stiles, who'd gone deathly pale, and was now shaking his head.“Stiles-, Eli is your son.” Derek forced out.Stiles let out a small breathless sound of “Oh!”He shot up from the couch and took his head between his hands, pulling his hair.When that didn’t help to quiet the raging flood of questions in his head, he started pacing.“What? -I mean…how? How is that even possible?""Why the hell would you keep that from me?” He was spluttering.Stiles couldn’t believe what he was hearing.  Why would Derek do that?

entry.title: My Name is Derek Hale [comic]
entry.summary:
Author: Melioristicbeast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 0Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 277

Summary: From the original fic this comic is an adaptation of:“What day is it?” Derek demanded.“What?”“The day! What day is today?!” Derek let Stiles go, but only so he could reach into his pocket and pull out his phone. He tapped at the home screen, and then went so perfectly still that Stiles was pretty sure this guy wasn’t human. No human could stand that still.When it was clear Derek wasn’t going to move again without some prompting, Stiles said, “It’s Wednesday.”“That’s impossible,” Derek whispered.“Not really, it comes around every seven days.”“This is impossible,” Derek said again, looking around himself, as if he was searching for something.

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,495Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 134

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcase in the living room. Beside it in marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back. But in the corner in tiny letters: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does. The next page has the present date and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone. I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest. Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf. We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. --- What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

entry.title: of principal visits and soft nights
entry.summary:
Author: suitelif3

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,586Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: They eventually made it back to Derek’s house after a long day of outings, and Eli ended up tucked gently into Derek’s shoulder, his eyes blinking blearily, struggling to stay awake. “Do you want to come in?” Derek asked softly. “If I’m still welcome to,” Stiles replied. “You’re always welcome, Stiles,” Derek stated, his eyebrows up, a little grin playing on the edge of his mouth. Stiles tried to tamp down the fluttery feeling he was getting in his chest. If not for himself, then for the werewolves he was standing right next to that could almost certainly pick up on it.

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,011Chapters: 3/15Kudos: 40

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.

entry.title: Fault Lines (Beneath My Heart)
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,200Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 21

Summary: In 2012, the world did in fact end… in a way.In 2012, midsummer, the first contact happened. Otherworldly creatures invaded. Some called them aliens, extremists called them angels.Everyone else just called them “Others”.After the Others invaded Earth, the government moved the remainder of the population into secret underground bunker systems. They said it was the only way to keep everyone alive. Keep everyone safe… What a joke.Stiles was just a normal high-school student until one random, seemingly normal day changed everything. He went from studying for his Biology test to running around the bunker system with Others on his ass, trying to capture him and do god knows what.How did it get to this?

entry.title: Enter: Zombies
entry.summary:
Author: hyacinth_fiction

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,148Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 64

Summary: The universe has a wonderful sense of timing and Stiles and co. are thrown into all kinds of antics when the world goes to hell in a handbasket. Join them as they journey away from the security of their old lives and towards the hope of a new safety. Do they make it? I suppose you'll have to read on to find out.This story is going to be slow burn, like that languid yearning we all know and love seasoned with well-ripened apocalypse angst. There will be spice in this tale, though not for a while.Solid trigger warning for canon-typical blood/violence, sex (specifically the queer kind), casual swearing, and some other bits I'll stick in the notes of the relevant chapters

entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 381,805Chapters: 33/40Kudos: 969

Summary: “Have you ever heard of the butterfly effect?” He looked up and shook his head. “No… what is it?” “It’s the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it’s wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.” He nodded, that’s exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place… then none of this would be happening. But fuck it, ‘caution’ isn’t in his vocabulary. ~~~ UPDATING SOON <3 (I’m currently going through the entire story from the beginning and changing ALOT. Full warning, until I’m done, there will be a few confusing moments. Srry in advance <3)

entry.title: fragmentary blue
entry.summary:
Author: idyllic_dae

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,256Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 365

Summary: "He's harmless. Look at him," Derek says, and Stiles bristles."I am not—""You smell what I do," Talia speaks over him. "Do not be so easily fooled."Stiles isn't sure whose side to take. If he agrees with Talia, he argues against being set free. If he agrees with Derek, he admits he's weak and helpless. Neither option is appealing."Yes," Derek says. "But he's a kid, and he's terrified—""Actually, I'm seventeen and very brave—""—and he has no idea what he is."

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,343Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 124

Summary: While working for the FBI Melinda Stilinski (Fem Stiles) gets the call that Derek is dead. In a fit of Grief she rushes home to Beacon Hills and finds herself at the Nemeton where she is offered a choice. Will that choice be enough to fix the future? Tune in to find out. entry.title: Endlessly trying
entry.summary:
Author: Eminet_2

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,953Chapters: 13/15Kudos: 130

Summary: Gods didn’t exist. At least that’s what Stiles believed at first. But since Stiles has seen literal werewolves he should probably not assume much about the current state of reality.Alas, gods exist, or maybe he’s hallucinating. Considering he’s been playing around a bunch of Deaton’s books (which he stole) trying to find a solution to the alpha pack problem and ended up dreaming about well… someone who looks like the physical manifestation of hot topic.
